titleStmt.title: By the Commander in Chief of the forces in Scotland. Whereas His Excellency by his proclamation of the fifth day of November, 1650. heretofore published (remaining still in force) requiring plenary satisfaction for goods, and life for life taken from any of the English army ...
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, Robert, 1613-1665.

titleStmt.title: By the Commander in Chief of the forces in Scotland. Whereas His Excellency by his proclamation of the fifth day of November, 1650. heretofore published (remaining still in force) requiring plenary satisfaction for goods, and life for life taken from any of the English army ...
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, Robert, 1613-1665.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed and dated at foot of text: Given under my hand and seal at Dalkeith, the 27. day of September, 1653. R. Lilburne.
Orders the apprehension of rebels against the Commonwealth.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
